dcterms:description: The CMUDict 0.7b dataset is a publicly available resource used for grapheme-to-phoneme conversion, containing a training/validation/test split of 108,952 training words, 5,447 validation words, and 12,855 test words. It includes grapheme and phoneme vocabulary sizes of 27 and 39 respectively, with stress markings removed and multiple pronunciations retained.
dcterms:title: CMUDict 0.7b

dcterms:description: The internal English dataset contains 184,243 training words, 10,837 validation words, and 21,678 test words, including uppercase and lowercase letters and stress markings. The dataset is used for grapheme-to-phoneme conversion.
dcterms:title: Internal English dataset
